alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Madison; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 7:57PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Madison, northeastern Swain and northwestern Haywood Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 757 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Marshall to 8 miles southwest of Gatlinburg. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cherokee, Smoky Mountains-Deep Creek, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Cataloochee, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Smoky Mountains-Big Creek, Smoky Mountains-Oconaluftee, Smoky Mountains-Clingmans Dome, B.R. Parkway-Smoky Mountains To Balsam Gap and Waterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for western North Carolina.
